sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 19, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.41 per share is scheduled to be paid on April 16, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased ECL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 10.81% increase over prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $136.7, representing a -2.7% decrease from the 52 week high of $140.50 and a 11.52% increase over the 52 week low of $122.58.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $5.14.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 14.05%, compared to an industry average of 20%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
